h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Aside from a Ginsengling hiding in the ruins nearby, that's it for this route, so return back to the previous platform and head down the sloping path.
promot:

The content is as follows:
Aside from a Ginsengling hiding in the ruins nearby, that's it for this route, so return back to the previous platform and head down the sloping path.
